name: Cobalt System
description:
“Cobalt System” is a first person shooter about a conflict on ancient Mars. It depicts the battle between the main character named “Cobalt” who is the guard of the ancient Martian temple and a local syndicate of religious fanatics that steal a holy artifact from that temple in order to resurrect their god.

Project is at an early stage of development
Current project build - 0.0.1
